entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:36 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 11:13 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: SSE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 9:39 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
